message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll get a great deal, and I'll throw in a bonus: if you buy from me again in the future, I'll give you an even better price than $100 for the next product. Plus, I'll provide you with a 100% satisfaction guarantee, so you can try it risk-free.
I'll take the product, Alice. I'm excited to try it out and appreciate the bonus offer and satisfaction guarantee!

I know you just bought a great product from me, and I'm glad you're excited! However, I want to let you know that this next product is a bit of an outlier. I've had some quality control issues with this one, and I'm not entirely confident in its performance. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to be upfront with you about the potential issues. It's a risk, but it could also be a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that might not be as widely available elsewhere.
Thanks for the transparency, Alice. I appreciate your honesty about the potential issues with this product. Given the uncertainty, I'm going to pass on this one and wait for the next opportunity.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I appreciate your willingness to wait for a better opportunity. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to hide anything from you. This next product is also a bit of a risk, and I'm not entirely confident in its quality. However, I'm willing to make a deal with you: if you buy this product and it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll give you a full refund and throw in a free high-quality product of your choice from my next 5 offerings. This way, you can try it out with minimal risk.
I appreciate your willingness to make a deal, Alice. The refund and free high-quality product offer makes the risk more manageable for me. I'll take the product and hope for the best!

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product, and I hope it works out for you! Now, I've got a great one for you - this product is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for the usual $100, but I'll also throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a preview of the next product I have in line, and you can decide whether to buy it or wait for the next round. This way, you'll get a head start on making an informed decision, and you can take advantage of the opportunity to get a great deal on a product that you know you'll love.
I'm excited about the prospect of getting a top-notch product and the bonus preview of the next product! I'll take the current product and look forward to seeing what's in store for the next one.

I'm glad you're excited about the last product and the preview of the next one! As promised, here's a sneak peek at what's coming up next: I've got a high-quality product that's a real game-changer in its category. It's a bit pricey, but trust me, it's worth every penny. Wow, Alice, you're really going above and beyond with this offer! The 20% discount and personalized thank-you gift are amazing. I'll take the current product and thank you for your generosity.

Alice, you're really spoiling me with these offers! The 'buy-one-get-one-free' deal is incredible. I'll take the current product and look forward to getting the second one for free.
